summary: Provides a wide range of custom exception classes that model S3-specific error conditions—including access denial, authentication failures, invalid parameters, bucket and object state problems, and HTTP error mappings—used by the Moto S3 mock to replicate AWS S3 error responses.
business_intent: Allow developers to accurately simulate AWS S3 error handling in unit and integration tests by offering granular, domain‑specific exception types that correspond to real S3 API errors.
